select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, INPUT_CATEGORY, DB_CATEGORY, SUB_CATEGORY, PERSON_NO, PERSON_NAME, GENERATE_MODE, ALIAS, GENDER, BIRTH_DATETIME, AGE, ID_CARD_NO, CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NO, RACE, NATIONALITY, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, EMAIL, EDUCATION_LEVEL, IDENTITY, OCCUPATION, NATIVE_PLACE_REGIONALISM, NATIVE_PLACE_ADDR, RESIDENCE_REGIONALISM, RESIDENCE_ADDR, FINGERPRINT_NO, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, BODILY_FORM, BIRTH_DATE_FROM, BIRTH_DATE_TO, ROUGH_AGE, ROUGHLY_BIRTHDATE, MISSING_TYPE, MISSING_TIME, MISSING_PLACE, EXTRINSIC_SIGN, SPECIAL_SIGN, INVOLVED_CASE_NAME, INVOLVED_CASE_NO, CASE_PROPERTY, PRISON_TYPE, PRISON_NO, DEATH_FLAG, DELETE_FLAG, INDEX_FLAG, TRANSFER_FLAG, TRANSFER_USER, TRANSFER_DATETIME, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_LEVEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, REMARK, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, PERSON_LABEL, ABDUCT_TYPE, IF_SAMPLING, SAMPLING_DATETIME, SAMPLING_REGIONALISM, IF_TESTDNA, TEST_DATETIME, TEST_REGIONALISM, UNIT, IS_ARRESTED, ARREST_DAETTIME, IS_OFFENDER, EXT_ID, FAMILY_NO, FAMILY_NAME, LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, HIREDATE, DG_CASE_NAME, IF_FINGER, DG_DATA_TYPE, POST, COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS, GUARDIAN_DATE, COMMUNICATION_REGIONALISM, MEMORY, OTHER_INFO, MISSING_PLACE_REGIONALISM, P_STATUS, P_MSG, P_DATE, IS_INFER_AGE, VA from PERSON_INFO where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETE_FLAG = 0
and INIT_SERVER_NO like ''||#{initServerNoLike,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'

select ID, INIT_SERVER_NO, LAB_ID, CONSIGNMENT_ID, CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, INPUT_CATEGORY, DB_CATEGORY, SUB_CATEGORY, PERSON_NO, PERSON_NAME, GENERATE_MODE, ALIAS, GENDER, BIRTH_DATETIME, AGE, ID_CARD_NO, CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NO, RACE, NATIONALITY, MOBILE_PHONE, HOME_PHONE, EMAIL, EDUCATION_LEVEL, IDENTITY, OCCUPATION, NATIVE_PLACE_REGIONALISM, NATIVE_PLACE_ADDR, RESIDENCE_REGIONALISM, RESIDENCE_ADDR, FINGERPRINT_NO, BLOOD_TYPE, HEIGHT, BODILY_FORM, BIRTH_DATE_FROM, BIRTH_DATE_TO, ROUGH_AGE, ROUGHLY_BIRTHDATE, MISSING_TYPE, MISSING_TIME, MISSING_PLACE, EXTRINSIC_SIGN, SPECIAL_SIGN, INVOLVED_CASE_NAME, INVOLVED_CASE_NO, CASE_PROPERTY, PRISON_TYPE, PRISON_NO, DEATH_FLAG, DELETE_FLAG, INDEX_FLAG, TRANSFER_FLAG, TRANSFER_USER, TRANSFER_DATETIME, DATA_SOURCE, DATA_LEVEL, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, REMARK, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATETIME, PERSON_LABEL, ABDUCT_TYPE, IF_SAMPLING, SAMPLING_DATETIME, SAMPLING_REGIONALISM, IF_TESTDNA, TEST_DATETIME, TEST_REGIONALISM, UNIT, IS_ARRESTED, ARREST_DAETTIME, IS_OFFENDER, EXT_ID, FAMILY_NO, FAMILY_NAME, LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, HIREDATE, DG_CASE_NAME, IF_FINGER, DG_DATA_TYPE, POST, COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS, GUARDIAN_DATE, COMMUNICATION_REGIONALISM, MEMORY, OTHER_INFO, MISSING_PLACE_REGIONALISM, P_STATUS, P_MSG, P_DATE, IS_INFER_AGE, VA from PERSON_INFO
SELECT ci.id as CASE_ID, pi.* FROM PERSON_INFO pi ,consignment ct,case_info ci where pi.consignment_id = ct.id and ct.event_id = ci.id and pi.delete_flag ='0' and ci.id =#{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: pi.ID, pi.INIT_SERVER_NO, pi.LAB_ID, pi.CONSIGNMENT_ID, pi.CONSIGN_ORG_CODE, pi.INPUT_CATEGORY, pi.DB_CATEGORY, pi.SUB_CATEGORY, pi.PERSON_NO, pi.PERSON_NAME, pi.GENERATE_MODE, pi.ALIAS, pi.GENDER, pi.BIRTH_DATETIME, pi.AGE, pi.ID_CARD_NO, pi.CERTIFICATE_TYPE, pi.CERTIFICATE_NO, pi.RACE, pi.NATIONALITY, pi.MOBILE_PHONE, pi.HOME_PHONE, pi.EMAIL, pi.EDUCATION_LEVEL, pi.IDENTITY, pi.OCCUPATION, pi.NATIVE_PLACE_REGIONALISM, pi.NATIVE_PLACE_ADDR, pi.RESIDENCE_REGIONALISM, pi.RESIDENCE_ADDR, pi.FINGERPRINT_NO, pi.BLOOD_TYPE, pi.HEIGHT, pi.BODILY_FORM, pi.BIRTH_DATE_FROM, pi.BIRTH_DATE_TO, pi.ROUGH_AGE, pi.ROUGHLY_BIRTHDATE, pi.MISSING_TYPE, pi.MISSING_TIME, pi.MISSING_PLACE, pi.EXTRINSIC_SIGN, pi.SPECIAL_SIGN, pi.INVOLVED_CASE_NAME, pi.INVOLVED_CASE_NO, pi.CASE_PROPERTY, pi.PRISON_TYPE, pi.PRISON_NO, pi.DEATH_FLAG, pi.DELETE_FLAG, pi.INDEX_FLAG, pi.TRANSFER_FLAG, pi.TRANSFER_USER, pi.TRANSFER_DATETIME, pi.DATA_SOURCE, pi.DATA_LEVEL, pi.RESERVE1, pi.RESERVE2, pi.RESERVE3, pi.RESERVE4, pi.RESERVE5, pi.RESERVE6, pi.REMARK, pi.CREATE_USER, pi.CREATE_DATETIME, pi.UPDATE_USER, pi.UPDATE_DATETIME, pi.PERSON_LABEL, pi.ABDUCT_TYPE, pi.IF_SAMPLING, pi.SAMPLING_DATETIME, pi.SAMPLING_REGIONALISM, pi.IF_TESTDNA, pi.TEST_DATETIME, pi.TEST_REGIONALISM, pi.UNIT, pi.IS_ARRESTED, pi.ARREST_DAETTIME, pi.IS_OFFENDER, pi.EXT_ID, pi.FAMILY_NO, pi.FAMILY_NAME, pi.LOCAL_STORE_DATETIME, pi.LOCAL_CREATE_DATETIME, pi.HIREDATE, pi.DG_CASE_NAME, pi.IF_FINGER, pi.DG_DATA_TYPE, pi.POST, pi.COMMUNICATION_ADDRESS, pi.GUARDIAN_DATE, pi.COMMUNICATION_REGIONALISM, pi.MEMORY, pi.OTHER_INFO, pi.MISSING_PLACE_REGIONALISM, pi.P_STATUS, pi.P_MSG, pi.P_DATE, pi.IS_INFER_AGE, pi.VA
mapper.select:
select
from PERSON_INFO pi, SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP spm where pi.ID=spm.PERSON_OBJECT_ID and pi.CONSIGNMENT_ID=#{consignmentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and spm.RELATION in (#{selfRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selfPossibleRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and pi.DELETE_FLAG=0

select
from PERSON_INFO pi where pi.CONSIGNMENT_ID=#{consignmentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pi.DELETE_FLAG=0
